name: Wallaby / Granny Smith
notes: Gold Fields operation, WA. ~1.3 Mtpa ore (~3,500 tpd). Paste backfill system. Est. ~1,500 tpd paste.

name: Odysseus (Cosmos)
notes: Nickel mine, WA. IGO. ~0.9 Mtpa ore (~2,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~1,200 tpd paste.

name: Kathleen Valley
notes: Biggest paste plant in Australia (two trains). 2900m³/day per paste plant. GR Engineering EPC.

name: Golden Grove
notes: Polymetallic mine, WA. ~1.4 Mtpa ore (~3,800 tpd). Paste backfill system. Est. ~2,000 tpd paste. 29 Metals.

name: Flying Fox
notes: Nickel mine, Kambalda region. IGO. ~0.55 Mtpa ore (~1,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~800 tpd paste. Mine winding down.

name: Telfer
notes: Paste plant confirmed at MineFill 2024. ~27,400 tpd ore (10Mtpa Train 1). Est. ~5,500 tpd paste (20% of ore to UG fill).

name: Lake Cowal
notes: NSW gold operation. Evolution Mining. ~3.5 Mtpa processing (~9,600 tpd). Underground development with paste backfill. Est. ~1,200 tpd paste.

name: Cobar (CSA Mine)
notes: Historic copper mine, NSW. ~1.1 Mtpa ore (~3,000 tpd). Est. ~1,800 tpd paste. Metals Acquisition Corp acquired 2023.

name: Lady Loretta
notes: Zinc-lead mine, QLD. Glencore. ~1.0 Mtpa ore (~2,700 tpd). Est. ~1,500 tpd paste.

name: Pajingo
notes: Gold mine, QLD. Minjar Gold. ~0.37 Mtpa ore (~1,000 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~500 tpd paste.

name: Fender

name: Bronzewing
notes: Gold mine, WA. Northern Star. ~0.66 Mtpa ore (~1,800 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~800 tpd paste.

name: Olympic Dam
notes: World's largest underground mine. A$840M paste system investment. ~12,300 tpd ore, est. ~6,000 tpd paste. New cement paste backfill system commissioning 2026.

name: George Fisher
notes: Glencore zinc mine, Mt Isa complex. ~2.0 Mtpa ore (~5,500 tpd). Est. ~3,500 tpd paste. Paste backfill system.

name: Sunrise Dam
notes: Large underground gold mine, WA. AngloGold Ashanti. ~2.0 Mtpa ore (~5,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~2,000 tpd paste.

name: Henty
notes: Gold mine, Tasmania. Kaiser Reef. ~0.44 Mtpa ore (~1,200 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~600 tpd paste.

name: Plutonic
notes: Gold mine, WA. Catalyst Metals. ~0.9 Mtpa ore (~2,500 tpd). Paste backfill system. Est. ~1,000 tpd paste.

name: Dugald River
notes: 1.5 Mtpa mine production (~4,800 tpd ore). ~50% tailings used for paste backfill (~2,400 tpd). 170-185kt Zn production.

name: Capricorn Copper
notes: Copper mine, QLD. 29 Metals (in administration). ~0.73 Mtpa ore (~2,000 tpd). Est. ~1,000 tpd paste.

name: Woodlawn
notes: Polymetallic mine, NSW. Develop Global. ~0.55 Mtpa ore (~1,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~800 tpd paste.

name: Bluebird
notes: Gold mine, WA. Westgold Resources. ~0.55 Mtpa ore (~1,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~600 tpd paste.

name: Cannington
notes: L-P verified: 10k tpd. Golders Pastetech design. Paste backfill since 1997. ~4,932 tpd ore, est. ~2,500 tpd paste. Expanded to 1.8 Mtpa in 2001.

name: Garden Well
notes: 2026 commissioning — NEW plant (Mark Adams). First stope ore Jul-Sep 2026. Regis Resources first underground. Est. ~1,200 tpd paste.

name: Kanowna Belle
notes: L-P verified: 5k tpd. Kalgoorlie operations. Northern Star. ~1.3 Mtpa ore (~3,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~1,500 tpd paste.

name: Mt Charlotte

name: Karari (Carosue Dam)
notes: L-P verified: 3k tpd. 110-120 m³/h paste plant (~2,760 m³/day × 2.0 t/m³ ≈ 5,520 tpd). GR Engineering EPC 2018.

name: Mt Isa
notes: Deep underground Cu mine. Glencore. ~2.2 Mtpa ore (~6,000 tpd). Paste plant 2001. Est. ~3,000 tpd paste.

name: Mungari
notes: Gold mine, WA. Evolution Mining. ~1.7 Mtpa processing (~4,700 tpd). Est. ~1,500 tpd paste for underground operations.

name: St Ives
notes: L-P verified: 4k tpd. Gold mine, WA. Gold Fields. Invincible Reclaim Paste Plant. ~1.5 Mtpa ore (~4,000 tpd). Est. ~1,200 tpd paste.

name: Tanami

name: Leinster

name: Pogo
notes: Gold mine, Alaska. Northern Star. ~1.17 Mtpa ore (~3,200 tpd). 20% of tailings mixed with cement for paste. Est. ~1,000 tpd paste.

name: Thunderbox

name: Tomingley Gold

name: Didipio
notes: Gold/copper mine, Philippines. OceanaGold. ~1.3 Mtpa ore (~3,500 tpd). Paste backfill. Est. ~1,500 tpd paste.

name: Bulyanhulu
notes: Process plant capacity 3,300 tpd. Underground paste plant under construction (Q2 2024).

name: North Mara
notes: L-P verified: 2k tpd. Tanzania gold mine. Process plant 8,000 tpd capacity. Est. ~4,000 tpd paste. Barrick Gold.

name: Loulo-Gounkoto
notes: L-P verified: 5k tpd. 3 paste plants (Gabriel Kone, Mine Manager). CIL 5 Mtpa (~13,700 tpd ore). Est. ~7,000 tpd paste across 3 plants. TSF deposition 280,000 tpm.

name: Kibali
notes: L-P verified: 1k tpd. 190 m³/hr backfill plant (~4,560 m³/day × 2.0 t/m³ ≈ 9,120 tpd). Operating above design capacity. 7.2 Mtpa processing. Africa's largest gold mine.

name: Kamoa-Kakula
notes: L-P verified: 5k tpd. 600m³/hr — world's largest paste backfill plant. 19.2 Mtpa processing capacity.

name: Obuasi
notes: 2.2 Mtpa processing plant. Phase 2 expanded to 4,000 tpd. Paste-fill plant included in redevelopment.

name: Wassa
notes: L-P verified: 8k tpd. GR Engineering EPC. 5,000 tpd production rate. Outotec feasibility 2018.

name: South Deep
notes: L-P verified: 1k tpd. World's largest gold mine by reserves. CIP plant 4.0 Mtpa (~11,000 tpd ore). Est. ~5,500 tpd paste. Gold Fields.

name: Sukari
notes: 125 m³/hr pastefill plant (~3,000 m³/day × 2.0 t/m³ ≈ 6,000 tpd). Commissioned Q1 2023. Lycopodium designed.

name: Rosh Pinah
notes: L-P verified: 3k tpd. Namibia's first paste plant, commissioned Feb 2026. RP2.0 doubling processing to 1.3 Mtpa. Est. ~1,500 tpd paste.

name: Khoemacau
notes: Copper/silver mine, Botswana. MMG. 9% cement addition. $900M expansion to 130kt Cu/yr. Est. ~2,000 tpd paste.

name: Platreef
notes: PGM/nickel/copper/gold, SA. Ivanhoe Mines. Phase 1 700ktpa ramping. Paste plant planned. Est. ~1,000 tpd paste Phase 1.

name: Nova Xavantina

name: Caraíba

name: Turmalina

name: Aripuanã
notes: 45,000 m³/month capacity (~1,500 m³/day × 2.0 t/m³ = ~3,000 tpd). Nexa Resources polymetallic.

name: Buriticá
notes: 1,700 m³/day paste capacity (Marlon Suarez). ~3,400 tpd at 2.0 t/m³ density.

name: Marmato

name: SASA
notes: Zinc/lead mine, North Macedonia. Central Asia Metals. ~1.0 Mtpa ore (~2,700 tpd). Paste transition just commenced. Est. ~1,000 tpd paste.

name: Çayeli
